name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Software Engineer with 13+ years of experience delivering high-performance applications across the healthcare and financial industries. Proficient in **.NET**, **C#**, **Angular**, and **MS SQL Server**, with strong competency in **T-SQL**, **CSS**, and building **Web Services** and **REST APIs**. Experienced in adopting **Azure** for cloud-native application deployment and implementing **CI/CD** and **DevOps** practices to enhance development workflows. Knowledgeable in **Visual Studio** for efficient software development and skilled in creating robust **service-oriented architectures** and applying **design patterns** for scalable solutions.

In addition to primary expertise, I have hands-on experience in **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, and am adept at both frontend and backend development using **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. I excel in building AI/ML-powered platforms that leverage predictive analytics, automation, and real-time processing, while ensuring compliance with standards such as HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2. My background in MLOps includes model training, serving, and orchestration using **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.
